bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: The snapshot taken for the purple-facebook plugin is quite old. It's almost a year old now. There have been a number of commits since that release. Would probably be useful to get it updated so that bug reporting upstream is not met with "update".
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): purple-facebook-0.0.0.20160409-0.4.git66ee773
Due to the following bug: https://github.com/dequis/purple-facebook/issues/306 purple-facebook is no longer able to connect to facebook
purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2d2502e6b2

purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-3358363ace

purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates.
